text: Does anyone here know how I could avoid my website showing error messages for missing images such as "// Image matching '/assets/posts/random-forest/code/u-class.svg' not found. //". Would this be reported by the `sig=true` parameter for `optimize`?

text:
hmm I see what you're saying. Basically it was working fine locally but failed to deploy because your Project.toml or something wasn't right and you'd rather this did not go to the end.

I think this is reasonable; could you open an issue on GitHub? Basically the only thing to do is to have a "throw" with `html_error` if some environment variable that would be toggled by `optimize` is set (like `FD_ENV[:STRICT]`" or whatever)
